::KitKat::

She smiled. There was someone who hated Megatron more than 
her. "Since you have become loyal to me, I shall repay you by giving 
you the pleasure of firing first on Megatron. But not until I give 
the order." she smiled evilly.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Alloran2@a... wrote:
> :::Bludgeon:::
> 
> ::Man, he thought.  No one's ever heard of me!::
> Bludgeon: Ya see, i was leader of the Decepticons after Scorponok 
died, but 
> soon, after i was forced away from the planet Klo, The criminal 
organization 
> Cobra gave the original Megatron a new body, that of a tank. When 
he saw i 
> was a threat to his regaining leadership, he blasted me with his 
rail gun.
